snippet.title: The Letter (Horror Visual Novel) - Animated Opening Trailer
snippet.description:
BUY THE GAME: https://yangyangmobile.itch.io/the-letter
https://store.steampowered.com/app/460430

DOWNLOAD ON GOOGLEPLAY: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yym.theletter

DOWNLOAD ON IOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/the-letter-horror-visual-novel/id1251251637?mt=8

------
Song Title: Letters Goodbye
Performed by: Amanda Lee (LeeandLie)
Lyrics by: Yangyang Mobile
Composed by: Dualist Make Music
Vocal Mixer: Freddy (Fruutella)

LYRICS
Write off your loss, send letters goodbye,
I won’t forget you, though your life fades away,
As I wither in this world, filled with regret,
Hold my hand and lead, please don’t leave me be.
In these bloody halls, where we shed all our tears,
The darkness wakes, our memories alone remain.

I reach out beyond the curtain black,
I’m in too deep, so this letter I write,
I want to be free together by your side,
And spend eternity in this lonely place we call home

------
The Letter's Steam Page is Up!! http://store.steampowered.com/app/460430
Play the demo: https://yangyangmobile.itch.io/the-le...
FB: https://www.facebook.com/yangyangmobile/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/yangyangmobile
Tumblr: http://yangyangmobile.tumblr.com/

STORY
In the outskirts of Luxbourne City stands a 17th-century English mansion, rumored to be haunted by vengeful spirits. After reading a letter discovered inside on the day of its open house, seven people find themselves trapped in a vicious cycle of madness plaguing the Ermengarde Mansion for centuries. Will they be able to free themselves from it, or will they become another casualty?

FEATURES
- Non-chronological storytelling with seven chapters, spanning around 500,000 words.
- Seven playable characters with varying personality and approach to difficult situations.
- Countless butterfly effects; the choices and endings you get for the previous chapters heavily affect how the succeeding chapters will play out.
- Full English Voice Acting.
- Animated backgrounds, CGs and sprites.
- Beautifully painted art style, with over 80 backgrounds and 100 CGs.
- Original soundtrack, with opening, ending and true ending theme songs.
- Quick-Time Events (optional).
- Mend or break relationships.
- A branching tree that keeps track of your progress/route.
- A journal that narrates the events in chronological order, and jots down the clues found about the Ermengarde Mansion.
- Over 90 achievements.
